8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr narrated that:The Messenger of Allah said: "The most virtuous fast is the fast of my brother Dawud. He would fast a day, and not fast (the next) day. He would not flee at the time of engagement (with the enemy)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سَرْدِ الصَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting Consecutive Days
